column2: we ordered all three of the paellas: chicken
column4: and seafood (scallops and shrimp). This was my first time ever trying paella
column5: and I am now hooked. I have been craving this saffron goodness ever since
column6: and I will actually be having dinner there this weekend. I thought the paella was going to be very similar to risotto
column7: but it was not as heavy. The chef's use seasonal veggies
